original_text: Therefore I will make Samaria as an heap of the field, and as plantings of a vineyard: and I will pour down the stones thereof into the valley, and I will discover the foundations thereof.
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 사마리아를 들의 무더기 같게 하고 포도 심을 동산 같게 하며 또 그 돌들을 골짜기에 쏟아내리고 그 기초를 드러내며

sentences.original_text: as an heap of the field
and as plantings of a vineyard:
and I will pour down the stones thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것의 돌들을 골짜기에 쏟아 내리며

sentences.original_text: and I will discover the foundations thereof.
